Active learning account: Active learning engages sensorimotor associations, coordinates selective attention, and enhances uncertainty monitoring
Social learning account: Social partners enhances the learner's attention to relevant information

Active learning account: Active learning provide uses prior knowledge,  hypotheses, and ability  to generate higher quality input
Social learning account: Social partners generate high quality input that is shaped to the learner's current cognitive abilities

Active learning account: Active learning assumes weak sampling, leading to less-restrictive generalization
Social learning account: Social partners generate goal-directed behavior, leading  to stronger inferences and generalation
